data.message:
Hi Em (if you ever see this) I would love confirmation if you ever do even if it's literally someone running your Facebook simply messaging me over private message saying "he's seen this" if at all poss but I was there last night at Wembley & I just feel I need to show you my status I literally just wrote before coming on your page, anyway, sorry I chat shit when I'm nervous!!
....I feel today like I'm on the start of a new journey in my life, it's like the rap god himself has come & saved me, the buzz I still feel from seeing that incredible man & pure talent of an artist (Dre too ofc! 💗)  still sends shivers all over my body (nice shivers), his songs (especially "sing for the moment", "til I collapse", "not afraid" & "lose yourself" especially) have made me feel for the first time in years like I can make a better life for me, my man & my babies Tobias Jackson & Marshall Cain. 
I just need to start believing in me. I hope you all don't mind me sharing this & I also sorta hope nobody's like "STFU BITCH" coz I really do feel I'm finally on the "positivity path" of life & it feels so DAMN GOOD! ⭐️⭐️⭐️

I live forever grateful to #Eminem #WembleyStadium #July12 #DrDre 💗⭐️💗

I love you so much, always ❤️❤️❤️ xxxx
